name: Belair Services International
overview:
Belair Services International (BSI) specializes in adult education services and marketing, including education lead generation. Its own online college, Belair Online (www.belair-online.com), delivers adult courses in business management, technology, and art.

In addition, BSI’s Belair Executive Education provides executive education and professional training for corporations and non-profits.

In support of corporate process optimization, it offers Promedia Telecom’s Promedia Interactive Intranet solution and asociated implementation services.
